description:
This schema represents objects for the temporary storage of Progenetix / bycon
query results.

id.description:
The unique identifier of this query result object in string format, e.g.
as a UUID v4.

sourceCollection.description: The gatabase collection that was queried to gather the response items.

sourceDb.description: The name of the database the query belongs to.

sourceKey.description:
The key in the sourceCollection that provided the response values stored
in this QueryBufferItem.

targetCollection.description: The database collection that should be queried with the targetValues.

targetKey.description:
The key in the targetCollection that should be used for creating a query
against, using the targetValues.

targetValues.description: The identifiers (e.g. biosample_id values or _id ObjectId values) used to retrieve tha data through matching them to the targetKey in the targetCollection. NOTE - While the type here is given as string they may also be internal identifiers such as MongoDB ObjectId entries.

title: QueryBufferItem
